content: {"name": "The Salvation Army - Solomon G Brown", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Serves residents of DC Wards 7 and 8\n", "email": "", "url": "https://salvationarmynca.org/nca/gethelp", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2300 Martin Luther King Ave SE", "address_2": null, "city": "Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20020", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.863003, "longitude": -76.991283}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 678-9773", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}]}
